articles.title: Passengers flee smoking jet on emergency slide after apparent landing gear problem at Denver airport - AP News
articles.description: Authorities say passengers had to evacuate a smoking American Airlines jet at Denver International Airport using an emergency slide. The Federal Aviation Administration says the Boeing 737 MAX 8 reported a “possible landing gear incident” during its departure…
articles.content:
DENVER (AP) Passengers slid down an emergency slide of a smoking jet at Denver International Airport due to a possible problem with the planes landing gear, authorities said.

articles.title: Citi Rolls Out a New Premium Card in Fight for Affluent Customers - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: With a $595 annual fee, the Strata Elite will compete with the Chase Sapphire Reserve and American Express Platinum
